name: NSSplitViewDelegate
desc: A set of optional methods that a delegate of a split view implements.

items.name: func splitViewWillResizeSubviews(Notification)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when the split view is about to resize its subviews.

items.name: func splitViewDidResizeSubviews(Notification)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when the split view resizes its subviews.

items.name: func splitView(NSSplitView, canCollapseSubview: NSView) -> Bool
items.desc: Allows the delegate to determine whether the user can collapse and expand the specified subview.

items.name: func splitView(NSSplitView, effectiveRect: NSRect, forDrawnRect: NSRect, ofDividerAt: Int) -> NSRect
items.desc: Allows the delegate to modify the rectangle where mouse clicks initiate divider dragging.

items.name: func splitView(NSSplitView, shouldHideDividerAt: Int) -> Bool
items.desc: Allows the delegate to determine whether the user can drag a divider or adjust it off the edge of the split view.

items.name: func splitView(NSSplitView, additionalEffectiveRectOfDividerAt: Int) -> NSRect
items.desc: Allows the delegate to return an additional rectangle where mouse clicks can initiate divider dragging.

items.name: func splitView(NSSplitView, constrainSplitPosition: CGFloat, ofSubviewAt: Int) -> CGFloat
items.desc: Allows the delegate to constrain the divider to certain positions.

items.name: func splitView(NSSplitView, constrainMinCoordinate: CGFloat, ofSubviewAt: Int) -> CGFloat
items.desc: Allows the delegate to constrain the minimum coordinate limit of a divider when the user drags it.

items.name: func splitView(NSSplitView, constrainMaxCoordinate: CGFloat, ofSubviewAt: Int) -> CGFloat
items.desc: Allows the delegate to constrain the maximum coordinate limit of a divider when the user drags it.

items.name: func splitView(NSSplitView, resizeSubviewsWithOldSize: NSSize)
items.desc: Allows the delegate to specify custom sizing behavior for the subviews of the split view.

items.name: func splitView(NSSplitView, shouldAdjustSizeOfSubview: NSView) -> Bool
items.desc: Allows the delegate to specify whether to resize the subview.
